channel.title: Help me with my Code please :) [delta 317] - still no help :\

item.title: Help me with my Code please :) [delta 317] - still no help :\
item.dc:creator: @swebbyscape swebbyscape
item.description:
@swebbyscape wrote:

Okay Well i’m running delta and i’m trying to make a suggestion code.
I want it to be when a player named “john” says something like: “::suggest add an alter at home”
I want it to put that in a text doc. named “suggestions” in my config folder as: “John - add an alter at home”
I’ve started the code but i really have no idea how to make it say what the person said.
Here is what i have so far, any help will be appreciated!

if (command.startsWith("suggest") && playerRights >= 0) { writeLog(p.playerName, "Suggestions"); }

Thanks in Advance, Steve.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me with my Code please :) [delta 317] - still no help :\
